Slimebound:GangUp.NAME: Gang Up
Slimebound:GangUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Slime slots. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser_Slime X times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:GangUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 Slime slots. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser_Slime X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.NAME: Protect the Boss
Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would be damaged by an enemy Attack, slimeboundmod:Absorbing your leading Slime instead.
Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next 2 times you would be damaged by an enemy Attack, slimeboundmod:Absorbing your leading Slime instead.

Slimebound:SamplingLick.NAME: Sampling Lick
Slimebound:SamplingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SamplingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DuplicateSlimes.NAME: Replication
Slimebound:DuplicateSlimes.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate all of your spawned Slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Replication.NAME: Replication
Slimebound:Replication.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Add a copy of that card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:AbsorbAll.NAME: Absorption
Slimebound:AbsorbAll.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb all of your spawned Slimes. Gain 3 Block per slime slimeboundmod:Absorbed.

Slimebound:Overexert.NAME: Overexert
Slimebound:Overexert.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 slimeboundmod:Potency. NL slimeboundmod:Command twice. NL !M! turns from now, slimeboundmod:Absorb all of your spawned slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Split.NAME: Split
Slimebound:Split.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a random slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SuperSplit.NAME: Super Split
Slimebound:SuperSplit.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Slime slots. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a random slime X times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SuperSplit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 Slime slots. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a random slime X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LeadByExample.NAME: Lead By Example
Slimebound:LeadByExample.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn that targets enemies also slimeboundmod:Commands.
Slimebound:LeadByExample.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! cards you play each turn that targets enemies also slimeboundmod:Commands.

Slimebound:SlimeTap.NAME: Slime Tap
Slimebound:SlimeTap.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb your leading Slime. Gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SlimeTap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb your 2 leading Slimes. Gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards for each slimeboundmod:Absorbed. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Teamwork.NAME: Teamwork
Slimebound:Teamwork.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Gain X slimeboundmod:Potency. NL slimeboundmod:Command X times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Teamwork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Gain X slimeboundmod:Potency. NL slimeboundmod:Command X times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SlimeBrawl.NAME: Slime Brawl
Slimebound:SlimeBrawl.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. Repeat for each of your spawned Slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SpikyOuterGoop.NAME: Goop Armor
Slimebound:SpikyOuterGoop.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you Attack an enemy who has slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:SelfFormingGoo.NAME: Self-Forming Goo
Slimebound:SelfFormingGoo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to a random enemy and gain 2 Block at the start of your next turn.

Slimebound:OozeBath.NAME: Ooze Bath
Slimebound:OozeBath.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:OozeBath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LeechingTouch.NAME: Leeching Touch
Slimebound:LeechingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to an enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Deal !D! damage.

Slimebound:Dissolve.NAME: Dissolve
Slimebound:Dissolve.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a number of random slimeboundmod:Lick cards to your hand equal to it's cost. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Dissolve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a number of random slimeboundmod:Lick cards to your hand equal to it's cost plus 1. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.NAME: Duplicated Form
Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP and !M! Max HP this combat. NL Gain [E] each turn. NL The first card you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.
Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP and !M! Max HP this combat. NL The first card you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.

Slimebound:Recollect.NAME: Recollect
Slimebound:Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.
Slimebound:Recollect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return 2 random 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.

Slimebound:GrowthPunch.NAME: Growth Punch
Slimebound:GrowthPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increased by !M! for each Slime.

Slimebound:CheckThePlaybook.NAME: Consult Playbook
Slimebound:CheckThePlaybook.DESCRIPTION: Add 4 random slimeboundmod:Tackle cards to your hand. They cost 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Recycling.NAME: Recycling
Slimebound:Recycling.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, return a random Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.
Slimebound:Recycling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, return a random Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.

Slimebound:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
Slimebound:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Morph a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Repurpose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL slimeboundmod:Morph a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:RollThrough.NAME: Roll Through
Slimebound:RollThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL You do not take damage from the next slimeboundmod:Tackle you play.

Slimebound:MassRepurpose.NAME: Mass Repurpose
Slimebound:MassRepurpose.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL slimeboundmod:Morph all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SoTasty.NAME: SO TASTY!
Slimebound:SoTasty.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. Add X random slimeboundmod:Lick cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Regenerate.NAME: Regenerate
Slimebound:Regenerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Lick.NAME: Lick
Slimebound:Lick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Lick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:HauntingLick.NAME: Haunting Lick
Slimebound:HauntingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:HauntingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:PoisonLick.NAME: Poison Lick
Slimebound:PoisonLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop and !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Poison. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:PoisonLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop and !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Poison. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:MegaLick.NAME: Mega-Lick
Slimebound:MegaLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:MegaLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:FocusedLick.NAME: Focused Lick
Slimebound:FocusedLick.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Poison, replacing them with slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Apply !M! slimeboundmod:Goop.
Slimebound:FocusedLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Poison, replacing them with slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Apply !M! slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.NAME: Rejuvenating Lick
Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
Slimebound:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: The first time you attack an enemy with slimeboundmod:Goop each turn, add a random slimeboundmod:Lick card to your hand.
Slimebound:Gluttony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time you attack an enemy with slimeboundmod:Goop each turn, add a random slimeboundmod:Lick card to your hand.

Slimebound:PressTheAttack.NAME: Press the Attack
Slimebound:PressTheAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop, slimeboundmod:Command.
Slimebound:PressTheAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop, slimeboundmod:Command twice.

Slimebound:StrikeFrailPoint.NAME: Cull the Frail
Slimebound:StrikeFrailPoint.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is Frail, remove all of their Block, then remove 1 Frail. NL Deal !D! damage.

Slimebound:SoulSicken.NAME: Soul Sicken
Slimebound:SoulSicken.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Convert half of the enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop to Poison.
Slimebound:SoulSicken.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Convert half of the enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop to Poison.

Slimebound:AcidGelatin.NAME: Acidic Goop
Slimebound:AcidGelatin.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison whenever you Attack an enemy who has slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:TongueLash.NAME: Tongue Lash
Slimebound:TongueLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for ALL of your slimeboundmod:Lick cards (including Exhausted cards).

Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.NAME: It Looks Tasty
Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random slimeboundmod:Lick card to your hand if the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop.
Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random Upgraded slimeboundmod:Lick card to your hand if the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:AcidTongue.NAME: Spreading Slime
Slimebound:AcidTongue.DESCRIPTION: Effects that apply slimeboundmod:Goop apply !M! more.

Slimebound:TendrilStrike.NAME: Toxin Strike
Slimebound:TendrilStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. The enemy loses HP equal to its Poison, then reduce its Poison by 1. NL Exhaust
Slimebound:TendrilStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. The enemy loses HP equal to twice its Poison, then reduce its Poison by 2. NL Exhaust

Slimebound:FirmFortitude.NAME: Feel Our Pain
Slimebound:FirmFortitude.DESCRIPTION: The first time you would take damage or lose HP on each of YOUR turns, an enemy takes that much damage instead.
Slimebound:FirmFortitude.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time you would lose HP on each of YOUR turns, an enemy takes that much damage instead.

Slimebound:AccelerateToxins.NAME: Accelerate Toxins
Slimebound:AccelerateToxins.DESCRIPTION: For each Poisoned enemy, trigger the Poison's end of turn effect. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:AccelerateToxins.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For each Poisoned enemy, trigger the Poison's end of turn effect twice. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:WasteNot.NAME: Waste Not
Slimebound:WasteNot.DESCRIPTION: Return all 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
Slimebound:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL On your next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Prepare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Retain up to !M! cards this turn. Exhaust.

Slimebound:Grow.NAME: Grow
Slimebound:Grow.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Slime slot in exchange for !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Slimebound:HungryTackle.NAME: Hungry Tackle
Slimebound:HungryTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.
Slimebound:HungryTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Return 2 random 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.

Slimebound:FinishingTackle.NAME: Finishing Tackle
Slimebound:FinishingTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. If the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop, gain !B! Block.

Slimebound:SlimesplosionOLD.NAME: Slimesplosion
Slimebound:SlimesplosionOLD.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! slimeboundmod:Goop and !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Poison to ALL enemies X times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LivingWall.NAME: Living Wall
Slimebound:LivingWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to attackers this turn.

Slimebound:Slimepotheosis.NAME: Slimepotheosis
Slimebound:Slimepotheosis.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand. Lose !M! HP for each card Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ComboTackle.NAME: Combo Tackle
Slimebound:ComboTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Draw a card.
Slimebound:ComboTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Draw a card for each Attack played this turn (Draws !M! cards).

Slimebound:Tackle.NAME: Tackle
Slimebound:Tackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.

Slimebound:GoopTackle.NAME: Opening Tackle
Slimebound:GoopTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Add a random slimeboundmod:Tackle card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Slimebound:GoopTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Add a random Upgraded slimeboundmod:Tackle card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Slimebound:Chomp.NAME: Chomp
Slimebound:Chomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of a random slimeboundmod:Tackle card in your hand by 1 this combat.

Slimebound:DouseInSlime.NAME: Douse in Slime
Slimebound:DouseInSlime.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL The next time an Attack is used on this enemy, slimeboundmod:Goop is not removed.

Slimebound:FlameTackle.NAME: Flame Tackle
Slimebound:FlameTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL slimeboundmod:Tackles deal !M! more damage this combat.

Slimebound:VenomTackle.NAME: Venom Tackle
Slimebound:VenomTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. Apply !M! Poison if the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:RainOfGoop.NAME: Rain of Goop
Slimebound:RainOfGoop.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to a random enemy !M! times.
Slimebound:RainOfGoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to a random enemy !M! times.

Slimebound:GoopSpray.NAME: Goop Spray
Slimebound:GoopSpray.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Slimebound:MassFeed.NAME: Mass Feed
Slimebound:MassFeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ViciousTackle.NAME: Vicious Tackle
Slimebound:ViciousTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. This gains twice the damage bonus from slimeboundmod:Goop.
Slimebound:ViciousTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. This gains twice the damage bonus AND healing from slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:LeechEnergy.NAME: Leech Energy
Slimebound:LeechEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain [E] and draw a card if the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop.
Slimebound:LeechEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain [E] and draw 2 cards if the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:LeechLife.NAME: Leech Life
Slimebound:LeechLife.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to the enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Equalize.NAME: Equalize
Slimebound:Equalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL This card is played twice if below half of max HP. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DisruptingSlam.NAME: Disrupting Slam
Slimebound:DisruptingSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Apply !M! Weak to each enemy that intends to attack.

Slimebound:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
Slimebound:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
Slimebound:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 3 times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DefensiveMode.NAME: Defensive Mode
Slimebound:DefensiveMode.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Gain !B! Block, and another !B! Block next turn.

Slimebound:PrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare: Crush
Slimebound:PrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:PrepareCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SlimeCrush.NAME: SLIME CRUSH!!!
Slimebound:SlimeCrush.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Icky.NAME: Icky
Slimebound:Icky.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, add a Slimed Status to your hand.

Slimebound:DivideAndConquerConquer.NAME: Conquer
Slimebound:DivideAndConquerConquer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for each spawned Slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DivideAndConquerDivide.NAME: Divide
Slimebound:DivideAndConquerDivide.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser or slimeboundmod:Guerilla slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:DivideAndConquerDivide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser AND slimeboundmod:Guerilla slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DivideAndConquer.NAME: Divide & Conquer
Slimebound:DivideAndConquer.DESCRIPTION: Add a Divide and a Conquer to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:DivideAndConquer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Upgraded Divide and an Upgraded Conquer to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ServeAndProtect.NAME: Serve & Protect
Slimebound:ServeAndProtect.DESCRIPTION: Add a Serve and a Protect to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:ServeAndProtect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Upgraded Serve and an Upgraded Protect to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ServeAndProtectServe.NAME: Serve
Slimebound:ServeAndProtectServe.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Leeching or slimeboundmod:Mire slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:ServeAndProtectServe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Leeching AND slimeboundmod:Mire slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ServeAndProtectProtect.NAME: Protect
Slimebound:ServeAndProtectProtect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gains !M! additional Block for each spawned Slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitBruiser.NAME: Split: Bruiser
Slimebound:SplitBruiser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser_Slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitLeeching.NAME: Split: Leeching
Slimebound:SplitLeeching.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Leeching_Slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitAcid.NAME: Split: Guerilla
Slimebound:SplitAcid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Guerilla_Slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitMire.NAME: Split: Mire
Slimebound:SplitMire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Mire_Slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:MinionMaster.NAME: Minion Master
Slimebound:MinionMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you slimeboundmod:Command, slimeboundmod:Command again.

Slimebound:BestDefense.NAME: Recklessness
Slimebound:BestDefense.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Tackles deal !M! more damage to enemies, and 1 more damage to you.

Slimebound:SplitSpecialist.NAME: Split: Specialist
Slimebound:SplitSpecialist.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Special Slimes to slimeboundmod:Split into. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SpecialForces.NAME: Special Forces
Slimebound:SpecialForces.DESCRIPTION: For each of your Slime Slots: NL Choose 1 of 3 Special Slimes to slimeboundmod:Split into. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SlimeSlap.NAME: Slime Slap
Slimebound:SlimeSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has slimeboundmod:Goop, it is not removed by this attack.

Slimebound:OneTwoCombo.NAME: One-Two Combo
Slimebound:OneTwoCombo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Command. NL Whenever you slimeboundmod:Split, return this from your exhaust pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ForwardTackle.NAME: Forward Tackle
Slimebound:ForwardTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL slimeboundmod:Command twice.

Slimebound:TagTeam.NAME: Tag Team
Slimebound:TagTeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a random Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command !M! times.

Slimebound:RallyTheTroops.NAME: Rally the Troops
Slimebound:RallyTheTroops.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, slimeboundmod:Command.

Slimebound:Nibble.NAME: Nibble
Slimebound:Nibble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random 0-cost card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Nibble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random Upgraded 0-cost card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
